ComicInfo.Summary: Atlantis Attacks Part 3: Sword of the Sirenas: Brawn faces off against Namor and is stabbed by Namor's trident. When new enemies of Atlantis, the Sirenas, join the fight, Jimmy Woo and his agents are unsure whether to believe their tales of Atlantean atrocities, which Namora denounces. Some choose to remain to protect Pan rather than return to the battle in Atlantis.
